Clan Trader Ilia: There are many ways to increase your clan's reputation, from capturing a castle or fortress in battle, to helping our wandering newbies. Protection a territory is also laudable, and in that spirit I wish to make you an offer if you can bring me these items: "1 Blood Alliance" to prove that you have successfully defended a castle, "10 Blood Oaths gained by preserving civic order in a territory", and finally "100 Knight's Epaulettes to prove that you are invincible in battle". Bring me these things, and I will personally see to it that your reputation increases.
